titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to require State approving agencies to approve courses of education that have been accredited and approved by a nationally recognized accrediting agency or association, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/14/2009--Introduced. Requires (current law authorizes) a state approving agency to approve, for purposes of the veterans' educational assistance program, courses of education that have been accredited and approved by a nationally recognized accrediting agency or association.
